newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Home Centers says Blue Square to buy stake.
newsitem.headline: Home Centers says Blue Square to buy stake.

text.p: Israel's Home Centers (DIY) Ltd said Monday that Blue Square-Israel Ltd had informed the company it intends to gradually obtain a 25 percent ownership of Home Centers through open-market purchases of common stock.

Blue Square, already a principal shareholder, said it would buy more shares from time to time depending on the price of shares and availability of funds until it obtains a 25 percent ownership position, Home Centers said.
Home Centers said Blue Square and another significant shareholder, Bilu Enterprises Ltd, had informed the company last October that each intended to purchase up to $1.0 million of its common shares.
Bilu on May 14 then informed the company it intended to buy up to another additional $1.0 million in shares on the open market, Home Centers said.
Blue Square and Bilu each purchased 252,900 shares since October 31, giving them respective 20.9 percent and 36.4 percent ownership stakes in Home Centers, the company said.
Home Centers stock was unchanged Monday at 5-1/2.
